src:
5 Kakek Nenek yang Sukses Jadi YouTuber Kuliner Hits
01 Nov 2019, 06:45 by Andi Annisa Dwi Rahmawati - detikFood


Foto: Istimewa

Jakarta - Di usia tak lagi muda, kakek nenek ini sukses jadi YouTuber kuliner. Mereka memamerkan momen masak hingga makan banyak hingga meraih banyak penonton.YouTuber kuliner tak hanya anak muda atau millennial saja. Para kakek dan nenek juga unjuk kebolehan dalam dunia kuliner. Misalnya saja memasak makanan enak dalam jumlah banyak hingga melahap makanan banyak sekaligus atau mukbang.Aksi YouTuber kakek dan nenek ini jadi viral karena memiliki keunikan masing-masing. Tak sekadar masak, ada yang memiliki misi mulia di balik konten kulinernya yaitu memberi makan anak yatim.Ada juga yang berusaha memperkenalkan makanan tradisional unik dari negaranya sehingga menarik perhatian penonton. Apalagi makanan tersebut diolah dengan metode tradisional pula.Berikut 5 YouTuber kakek nenek hits di dunia kuliner. Beberapa sempat viral namun kini sudah meninggal dunia karena sakit.(adr/odi)


Foto: Istimewa

1. Narayana ReddyDi usia 73 tahun, Narayana terkenal lewat kanal YouTube 'Grandpa Kitchen'. Kakek dari Telangana, India ini kerap memamerkan momennya bikin sajian istimewa ala dirinya. Ia menggunakan bahan-bahan yang mudah didapat dan mengolahnya dengan alat masak sederhana.Narayana tidak hanya memasak sajian khas India saja. Ia pernah membuat fried chicken, french fries, pizza hingga lasagna dalam porsi besar. Karena aksi uniknya, ia memiliki 4 juta subscriber di YouTube. Rata-rata videonya berdurasi 12-15 menit.Narayana tidak memakan masakannya sendirian. Ia membagikan makanan tersebut untuk anak-anak yatim. Kanal YouTube-nya sekaligus menggalang dana agar penonton bisa ikut terlibat dengan ajang bagi-bagi makanan untuk anak yatim. Namun belum lama ini kabar duka datang, Narayana menghembuskan nafas terakhirnya karena sakit yang diderita.Baca Juga: YouTuber Kakek 73 Tahun Ini Bagi-Bagi Makanan Untuk Anak Yatim

(adr/odi)



Foto: Istimewa

2. Karre MastanammaKisah YouTuber Karre Mastanamma juga viral. Sebab nenek ini aktif mengunggah kegiatan memasaknya hingga ia berusia 106 tahun. Mastanamma memiliki kanal YouTube bernama Country Foods. Nenek asal India ini dibantu cucu dan temannya dalam membuat beragam video masak.Disebut sebagai YouTuber tertua, Mastanamma ingin memperkenalkan budaya serta tradisi kuliner India. Video memasaknya dibuat dengan latar persawahan atau di alam bebas agar penonton bisa menikmati keindahan pemandangan di India.Mastanamma bahkan masih mengenakan kain sari. Ia pernah membuat chicken kebab yang banyak ditonton orang. Karena ia memakai tangan telanjang untuk mengaduk potongan ayam dengan bumbu rempah. Sedangkan tusukan kebab diambil dari ranting-ranting pohon yang ada di sekitarnya. Namun tahun lalu Mastanamma meninggal di usia 107 tahun.Baca Juga: Wanita Tertua di India Ini Sukses Jadi YouTuber di Usia 106 Tahun!

(adr/odi)



Foto: Istimewa

3. Nenek CaiDi usia 98 tahun, seorang nenek asal Chengdu, China masih semangat makan. Aksinya ketika mencicip ragam makanan pun direkam sang cucu yang bernama Cai. Ia lalu mengunggah video neneknya saat makan ke internet. Ternyata banyak orang suka dengan aksi makan nenek Cai.Nenek Cai tak pernah membatasi asupan makanan. Ia selalu menyantap makanan apapun yang ia inginkan, apalagi sang nenek merupakan penggemar makanan pedas. Beberapa makanan yang pernah ia cicip adalah burger, hot pot, es krim, dan ngemil keripik kentang."Dia (sang nenek), suka makan apapun yang anak muda makan," tutur Cai. Sampai-sampai Cai kerap membujuk sang nenek untuk mengonsumsi makanan yang lebih sehat. Cucu kesayangannya ini juga kerap mengingatkan agar neneknya membatasi makanan pedas dan minuman manis. Tapi reaksi sang nenek yang menolak saran itu membuat videonya semakin lucu.Baca Juga: Sering Unggah Video Makan, Nenek Berusia 98 Tahun Ini Jadi Seleb Online

(adr/odi)



Foto: Istimewa

4. Kim Young-wonDari Korea Selatan ada nenek 78 tahun bernama Kim Young-won yang hobi makan. Wanita dengan sapaan akrab nenek Kim ini memiliki kanal YouTube dengan lebih dari 164.000 subscriber. Ia hobi merekam aksinya ketika makan lalu mengunggahnya ke YouTube.Nenek Kim dibantu cucu perempuannya yang berusia sekitar 22 tahun. Dengan gigi yang masih lengkap dan kuat, ia menngaku tak alami kendala saat makan termasuk ketika menggigit makanan yang agak keras. Nenek Kim juga mengaku bisa makan banyak alias mukbang.Beberapa aksi Nenek Kim adalah mukbang permen, udang, buah hingga daun seledri segar. Uniknya nenek Kim tidak serta merta sombong karena sudah terkenal. Ia tetap seperti nenek biasa yang sehari-hari berkebun di desanya.Baca Juga: Kenalan dengan Kim Young-won, Nenek 78 Tahun yang Suka Mukbang

(adr/odi)



Foto: Istimewa

5. Namkoong Hwaja dan Iljun SeoSedikit berbeda kali ini ada YouTuber nenek kakek asal Korea Selatan bernama Namkoong Hwaja dan Iljun Seo. Sang nenek berusia 67 tahun dan kakek 77 tahun. Keduanya kerap pamer momen mukbang dibantu sang anak yang merekam dan mengunggah kegiatan makan mereka.Pilihan makanan kakek nenek ini beragam seperti seafood dan makanan Korea. Sebelum makan, Iljun dan Hwaja juga menjelaskan makanan apa yang akan mereka santap. Uniknya Hwaja juga sering memasak untuk makanan yang akan merek makan.Tak sekadar makan, Iljun dan Hwaja sering bikin gemas karena pamer momen mesra. Misalnya saling menyuapi ketika makan. Tak heran banyak netizen suka dengan pasangan kakek nenek ini.Baca Juga: Makan Kepiting hingga Gurita, Video Mukbang Pasangan Tua Ini Bikin Gemas

(adr/odi)
text:
5 Successful Grandparents Become Culinary YouTubers Hits
01 Nov 2019, 06:45 by Andi Annisa Dwi Rahmawati - detikFood


Photo: Special

Jakarta - At a young age, these grandparents became successful culinary YouTubers. They show off cooking moments to eat a lot to reach a lot of spectators. YouTuber culinary not only young or millennial. The grandparents also demonstrated their ability in the culinary world. For example, cooking delicious food in large quantities to eat a lot of food at once or mukbang. The act of YouTuber grandfather and grandmother became viral because they have their own uniqueness. Not just cooking, there are those who have a noble mission behind their culinary content, which is to feed orphans. There are also those who try to introduce the unique traditional foods of their country to attract the attention of the audience. Moreover, these foods are processed with traditional methods as well. Here are 5 YouTubers grandparents hits in the culinary world. Some had gone viral but now have died due to illness. (Adr / odi)


Photo: Special

1. Narayana ReddyAt age 73 years, Narayana is famous through the YouTube channel 'Grandpa Kitchen'. The grandfather from Telangana, India often shows off his moments to make a special dish his style. He uses ingredients that are easily available and processes them with simple cooking utensils. Narayana does not only cook Indian dishes. He once made fried chicken, french fries, pizza to lasagna in large portions. Because of his unique actions, he has 4 million subscribers on YouTube. The average video is 12-15 minutes long. Narayana doesn't eat the food alone. He distributed the food to orphans. The YouTube channel raises funds at the same time so that viewers can get involved with food distribution for orphans. But not long ago news of grief came, Narayana breathed his last due to the pain suffered. Also Read: YouTuber Grandfather 73 This Year Giving Food For Orphans

(adr / odi)



Photo: Special

2. Karre Mastanamma The story of the YouTuber Karre Mastanamma is also viral. Because this grandmother actively uploaded her cooking activities until she was 106 years old. Mastanamma has a YouTube channel called Country Foods. This Indian grandmother was helped by her grandchildren and friends in making various cooking videos. Called the oldest YouTuber, Mastanamma wanted to introduce Indian culture and culinary traditions. The cooking video is made in the background of rice fields or in the wild so that viewers can enjoy the beauty of the scenery in India .astanamma even still wears sari cloth. He had made chicken kebabs that many people watched. Because he uses his bare hands to stir the chicken pieces with herbs. While the kebab stab was taken from the branches of the trees around it. But last year Mastanamma died at the age of 107 years. Also Read: This Oldest Woman in India Becomes a Successful YouTuber at the Age of 106 Years!

(adr / odi)



Photo: Special

3. Grandma Cai At the age of 98 years, a grandmother from Chengdu, China is still passionate about eating. The action when tasting a variety of foods was recorded by his grandson named Cai. He then uploaded a video of his grandmother while eating to the internet. It turns out that many people like the act of eating Cai's grandmother. Grandma Cai never limited food intake. He always eats whatever food he wants, especially his grandmother is a fan of spicy food. Some of the foods that he has tasted are burgers, hot pots, ice cream, and snacking on potato chips. "He (the grandmother), likes to eat whatever young people eat," said Cai. To the extent that Cai often persuaded her grandmother to eat healthier foods. His favorite grandson is also often reminded that his grandmother limits spicy food and sweet drinks. But the reaction of the grandmother who refused the suggestion made the video even funnier. Also Read: Often Upload Videos Eat, This 98-Year-Old Grandma Becomes Online Celebrity

(adr / odi)



Photo: Special

4. Kim Young-won From South Korea there is a 78-year-old grandmother named Kim Young-won who likes to eat. This woman who is familiarly called Grandma Kim has a YouTube channel with more than 164,000 subscribers. He likes to record the action when eating and then upload it to YouTube. Grandma Kim is assisted by her granddaughter who is around 22 years old. With teeth that are still complete and strong, he does not experience obstacles when eating, including when biting into food that is rather hard. Grandma Kim also claimed to be able to eat a lot of mukbang alias. Some of the actions of Grandma Kim were mukbang candy, shrimp, fruit to fresh celery leaves. Interestingly, grandma Kim is not necessarily arrogant because it is already famous. He is still like an ordinary grandmother who is daily gardening in his village. Also Read: Acquaintance with Kim Young-won, 78-year-old Grandma Who Loves Mukbang

(adr / odi)



Photo: Special

5. Namkoong Hwaja and Iljun Seo A little different this time there are YouTubers grandparents from South Korean grandparents named Namkoong Hwaja and Iljun Seo. The grandmother is 67 years old and grandfather is 77 years old. Both of them often show off their mukbang moments assisted by the children who record and upload their eating activities. These grandparents' food choices are as varied as seafood and Korean food. Before eating, Iljun and Hwaja also explained what food they would eat. Uniquely Hwaja also often cooks for food that they will eat. Not just eating, Iljun and Hwaja often make exasperated because showing off intimate moments. For example feeding each other when eating. No wonder many netizens love this grandparents couple. Read Also: Eating Crabs to Octopus, This Old Couple's Mukbang Video Makes Anxiety

(adr / odi)
